title: SVR: The main customer of the war in Ukraine is Britain, London wants to blackmail Trump — EADaily, November 25th, 2025 — Politics, Russia
description:
Britain, despite the deplorable situation of the Armed Forces of Ukraine at the front, seeks to continue hostilities and convinces partners of the possibility of inflicting a strategic defeat on Russia. The reasons are reported today, November 25, by the SVR press bureau.
